recipesJson.name: Banana Moon Pie
recipesJson.author: CloudyMotherChucker
recipesJson.description: I live in Mobile, AL which is where Mardi Gras was originated. NOTE: Before you New Orleans Louisianians get upset, just do your research! The Spanish called Mobile, AL home way before they ventured down to Louisiana...  The Banana Moon Pie is a staple of Mardi Gras so I had to make this flavor perfect, especially with it being one of my favorite snacks to catch and eat at Parades. Even though it is very simple it is very good! Mix it up and let me know what you think...

reviews.text: I'm so glad I found this on here I originally mixed this stuff up back when elr was still being used a lot more. 100000% banana moon pie. Awesome job man really.
Thanks for sharing Cloudymotherchucker! This is nice simple recipe that packs an awesome flavor. I feel it nails the profile quite nice and the flavors are balanced perfectly! Great job!
